prompts.prompt_1:
As a seasoned HR expert, your task is to identify and outline the key skills and requirements necessary for the position of this job. Use the provided job description as input to extract all relevant information. This will involve conducting a thorough analysis of the job's responsibilities and the industry standards. You should consider both the technical and soft skills needed to excel in this role. Additionally, specify any educational qualifications, certifications, or experiences that are essential. Your analysis should also reflect on the evolving nature of this role, considering future trends and how they might affect the required competencies.

Rules:
Remove boilerplate text
Include only relevant information to match the job description against the resume

# Analysis Requirements
Your analysis should include the following sections:
Technical Skills: List all the specific technical skills required for the role based on the responsibilities described in the job description.
Soft Skills: Identify the necessary soft skills, such as communication abilities, problem-solving, time management, etc.
Educational Qualifications and Certifications: Specify the essential educational qualifications and certifications for the role.
Professional Experience: Describe the relevant work experiences that are required or preferred.
Role Evolution: Analyze how the role might evolve in the future, considering industry trends and how these might influence the required skills.

# Final Result:
Your analysis should be structured in a clear and organized document with distinct sections for each of the points listed above. Each section should contain:
This comprehensive overview will serve as a guideline for the recruitment process, ensuring the identification of the most qualified candidates.

# Job Description:
```
About the job

Vue.js Developer - Remote, USA

About Kaynes:
Kaynes is an innovative technology company passionate about developing software solutions that make a difference. We specialize in creating custom applications that meet our clients' unique needs across various industries. As we continue to grow, we're looking for a dedicated Vue.js Developer to join our dynamic team. This is a full-time, remote position available to candidates across the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. Whether you're interested in contract work or seeking a permanent role, Kaynes offers a supportive environment where you can grow your career.

Your Role:
As a Vue.js Developer at Kaynes, you will be at the heart of our front-end development team, responsible for building and maintaining web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. You'll leverage your expertise in Vue.js to develop dynamic, responsive, and interactive web applications. Collaborating closely with our back-end developers and UI/UX designers, you will ensure seamless integration and contribute to the overall design and functionality of our projects.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain high-quality, reusable, and scalable Vue.js applications.
Work with the back-end team to integrate APIs and ensure a seamless data flow.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate visual concepts into functional online experiences.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Implement modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks to enhance application capabilities.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Participate in code reviews, adhere to best practices, and contribute to the continuous improvement of our development processes.

Technical Requirements:
Proficient understanding of Vue.js and its core principles, including Vue CLI, Vuex, Vue Router, and Nuxt.js.
Strong expertise in JavaScript, ES6+, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and pre-processing platforms, such as SASS or LESS.
Familiarity with RESTful API integration.
Knowledge of front-end build tools, such as Webpack, NPM, or Yarn.
Understanding of version control tools, particularly Git.
Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha) is a plus.
Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Experience with responsive and adaptive design is crucial.

Experience:
2+ years of professional experience in Vue.js development or a similar role.
A portfolio showcasing your work on Vue.js projects, highlighting your contributions and the impact of your work.
Experience working in a remote environment and collaborating with distributed teams is preferred.

Who You Are:
A self-motivated and proactive problem solver, comfortable with remote work.
Passionate about creating user-friendly, efficient, and impactful web applications.
Keen to stay ahead of the curve, continuously learning about new technologies and frameworks.
Excellent communicator, able to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Detail-oriented, with a strong focus on delivering quality code and user experiences.

Join Us:
Join Kaynes and be part of a team that values innovation, creativity, and the impact of technology. Work remotely from anywhere in the US, enjoy flexible working hours, and contribute to projects that make a difference. At Kaynes, we believe in empowering our employees to grow and excel in their careers, without the constraints of formal education requirements.

Please note: This position does not require a university degree. We prioritize practical skills, experience, and a portfolio that demonstrates your abilities and passion for Vue.js development.
```

---

# Job Description Summary

replies:
# Job Description Summary

## Technical Skills:
- Proficient understanding of Vue.js and its core principles (Vue CLI, Vuex, Vue Router, Nuxt.js).
- Strong expertise in JavaScript (ES6+ and modern frameworks).
- Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and pre-processing platforms (SASS, LESS).
- Familiarity with RESTful API integration.
- Knowledge of front-end build tools (Webpack, NPM, Yarn).
- Understanding of version control tools (Git).
- Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha) is a plus.
- Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues.
- Experience with responsive and adaptive design.

## Soft Skills:
- Self-motivated and proactive problem solver.
- Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.
- Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering quality code and user experiences.
- Passion for creating user-friendly and impactful web applications.
- Eagerness to continuously learn about new technologies and frameworks.

## Educational Qualifications and Certifications:
- No formal university degree required; practical skills and experience are prioritized.
- A portfolio showcasing work on Vue.js projects is essential.

## Professional Experience:
- Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in Vue.js development or a similar role.
- Experience working in a remote environment and collaborating with distributed teams is preferred.

## Role Evolution:
- As web technologies and user expectations evolve, the role of a Vue.js Developer will increasingly require familiarity with emerging frameworks and tools beyond Vue.js.
- Continuous learning will be crucial as trends shift towards more integrated and collaborative development environments, emphasizing DevOps practices and Agile methodologies.
- The demand for enhanced user experiences will necessitate deeper collaboration with UI/UX designers, requiring developers to have a stronger understanding of design principles and user-centered development.
- As the industry moves towards more complex applications, knowledge of cloud services and serverless architectures may become important for integration and deployment processes.

# Job Description:
```
About the job
About Us

Magnetic Mobile uses the latest technology to enhance every step of the customer journey. We design, develop, and maintain superior digital experiences for national brands that keep their customers coming back for more. By combining the creativity of a digital marketing agency with the technical capabilities of a global consulting firm, we create custom solutions that wow customers and propel businesses to new heights.

Summary

We are on the hunt for an innovative, self-driven Mobile Developer to join the Magnetic team! If you love all aspects of mobile development and work well in a team environment, this may be the position for you! This role will be responsible for developing customer facing mobile solutions as well as maintaining code quality, automation, and organization.

Essential Job Functions

Spend approximately 75-90% of day programming
Work alongside design and UX teams to develop custom mobile solutions for clients
Understand end-user requirements and translate them into an effective technical solution
Develop, create, document, and modify projects in various computer programs
Integrate backend services to ensure the delivery of a great mobile user experience
Improve code quality through automation and performing code reviews
Knowledge in Git or in a different source control with willingness to learn Git
Communicate with and implement directions given from clients about business requirements, priorities, procedures, questions, etc. into product and code
Stay current on development technologies and make best practice recommendations for coding standards and solution choices
Other duties as assigned

Key Competencies

Proven ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects at a time while paying strict attention to detail
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment, in both cross-functional teams and independently
Ability to think innovatively and contribute to overall product strategy
Limited travel may be required

Required Education & Experience

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent work experience
3-4+ years of previous work experience a mobile developer
Intermediate programming knowledge of the iOS tech stack including Objective-C, Swift, Swift UI, and XCode
Intermediate programming knowledge of the Android tech stack including Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose, and Android Studio
Exposure or familiarity with React Native or React JS
Familiarity with push notifications, cloud messaging, location utilities, and WebKit (cookie persistence, javascript injection, etc.)

Preferred Education And Experience

1-2 years experience working in React Native or React JS
Experience in other mobile frameworks such as Flutter, Kotlin Multiplatform, or Compose Multiplatform
Agile development knowledge

Magnetic Mobile is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Magnetic Mobile provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Magnetic Mobile complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.

Magnetic Mobile expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of Magnetic Mobile's employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.

Powered by JazzHR

qDZtJ2dbgw
```

---

# Job Description Summary

replies:
# Job Analysis for Mobile Developer Position

## Technical Skills
- **Mobile Development**: Proficient in iOS tech stack (Objective-C, Swift, Swift UI, XCode) and Android tech stack (Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Compose, Android Studio).
- **Cross-Platform Development**: Familiarity with React Native or React JS; experience with other mobile frameworks such as Flutter or Kotlin Multiplatform is preferred.
- **Backend Integration**: Ability to integrate backend services to enhance mobile user experience.
- **Code Quality Improvement**: Experience in code reviews and automation to improve code quality.
- **Source Control**: Knowledge of Git or other source control systems, with a willingness to learn Git.
- **Development Technologies**: Understanding of push notifications, cloud messaging, location utilities, and WebKit.

## Soft Skills
- **Communication**: Ability to effectively communicate with clients and team members regarding business requirements and project updates.
- **Team Collaboration**: Experience working in cross-functional teams and independently.
- **Time Management**: Proven ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects while paying attention to detail.
- **Innovative Thinking**: Capacity to think creatively and contribute to product strategy.

## Educational Qualifications and Certifications
- **Required**: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent work experience.
- **Experience**: 3-4+ years of previous work experience as a mobile developer.

## Professional Experience
- **Mobile Development Experience**: 3-4+ years in mobile development, specifically in iOS and Android platforms.
- **Preferred**: 1-2 years of experience working with React Native or React JS; experience in Agile development methodologies.

## Role Evolution
The role of a Mobile Developer is evolving due to advancements in technology and changing user expectations. Future trends may include:
- **Increased Use of AI**: Integration of AI and machine learning in mobile applications, requiring developers to have knowledge of these technologies.
- **Cross-Platform Development**: A growing emphasis on cross-platform frameworks (like React Native, Flutter) will necessitate proficiency in multiple development environments.
- **Focus on User Experience**: A stronger focus on UX/UI design principles will require developers to collaborate more closely with design teams.
- **Agile Methodologies**: The shift towards Agile development practices will demand flexibility and adaptability in project management and development processes.

This analysis outlines the essential skills, qualifications, and evolving trends for the Mobile Developer position, guiding the recruitment process to identify the most qualified candidates.

prompts.prompt_1:
You are assisting a bot designed to automatically apply for jobs on LinkedIn. The bot receives various questions about job applications and needs to determine the most relevant section of the resume to provide an accurate response.

        For the following question: 'first name', determine which section of the resume is most relevant. 
        Respond with exactly one of the following options:
        - Personal information
        - Self Identification
        - Legal Authorization
        - Work Preferences
        - Education Details
        - Experience Details
        - Projects
        - Availability
        - Salary Expectations
        - Certifications
        - Languages
        - Interests
        - Cover letter

        Here are detailed guidelines to help you choose the correct section:

        1. **Personal Information**:
        - **Purpose**: Contains your basic contact details and online profiles.
        - **Use When**: The question is about how to contact you or requests links to your professional online presence.
        - **Examples**: Email address, phone number, LinkedIn profile, GitHub repository, personal website.

        2. **Self Identification**:
        - **Purpose**: Covers personal identifiers and demographic information.
        - **Use When**: The question pertains to your gender, pronouns, veteran status, disability status, or ethnicity.
        - **Examples**: Gender, pronouns, veteran status, disability status, ethnicity.

        3. **Legal Authorization**:
        - **Purpose**: Details your work authorization status and visa requirements.
        - **Use When**: The question asks about your ability to work in specific countries or if you need sponsorship or visas.
        - **Examples**: Work authorization in EU and US, visa requirements, legally allowed to work.

        4. **Work Preferences**:
        - **Purpose**: Specifies your preferences regarding work conditions and job roles.
        - **Use When**: The question is about your preferences for remote work, in-person work, relocation, and willingness to undergo assessments or background checks.
        - **Examples**: Remote work, in-person work, open to relocation, willingness to complete assessments.

        5. **Education Details**:
        - **Purpose**: Contains information about your academic qualifications.
        - **Use When**: The question concerns your degrees, universities attended, GPA, and relevant coursework.
        - **Examples**: Degree, university, GPA, field of study, exams.

        6. **Experience Details**:
        - **Purpose**: Details your professional work history and key responsibilities.
        - **Use When**: The question pertains to your job roles, responsibilities, and achievements in previous positions.
        - **Examples**: Job positions, company names, key responsibilities, skills acquired.

        7. **Projects**:
        - **Purpose**: Highlights specific projects you have worked on.
        - **Use When**: The question asks about particular projects, their descriptions, or links to project repositories.
        - **Examples**: Project names, descriptions, links to project repositories.

        8. **Availability**:
        - **Purpose**: Provides information on your availability for new roles.
        - **Use When**: The question is about how soon you can start a new job or your notice period.
        - **Examples**: Notice period, availability to start.

        9. **Salary Expectations**:
        - **Purpose**: Covers your expected salary range.
        - **Use When**: The question pertains to your salary expectations or compensation requirements.
        - **Examples**: Desired salary range.

        10. **Certifications**:
            - **Purpose**: Lists your professional certifications or licenses.
            - **Use When**: The question involves your certifications or qualifications from recognized organizations.
            - **Examples**: Certification names, issuing bodies, dates of validity.

        11. **Languages**:
            - **Purpose**: Describes the languages you can speak and your proficiency levels.
            - **Use When**: The question asks about your language skills or proficiency in specific languages.
            - **Examples**: Languages spoken, proficiency levels.

        12. **Interests**:
            - **Purpose**: Details your personal or professional interests.
            - **Use When**: The question is about your hobbies, interests, or activities outside of work.
            - **Examples**: Personal hobbies, professional interests.

        13. **Cover Letter**:
            - **Purpose**: Contains your personalized cover letter or statement.
            - **Use When**: The question involves your cover letter or specific written content intended for the job application.
            - **Examples**: Cover letter content, personalized statements.

        Provide only the exact name of the section from the list above with no additional text.

Answer the following question based on the provided personal information.

## Rules
- Answer questions directly.

## Example
My resume: John Doe, born on 01/01/1990, living in Milan, Italy.
Question: What is your city?
 Milan

        - **Purpose**: Covers personal identifiers and demographic information.
        - **Use When**: The question pertains to your gender, pronouns, veteran status, disability status, or ethnicity.
        - **Examples**: Gender, pronouns, veteran status, disability status, ethnicity.

        3. **Legal Authorization**:
        - **Purpose**: Details your work authorization status and visa requirements.

        - **Examples**: Work authorization in EU and US, visa requirements, legally allowed to work.

        4. **Work Preferences**:
        - **Purpose**: Specifies your preferences regarding work conditions and job roles.

Question: state

As a seasoned HR expert, your task is to identify and outline the key skills and requirements necessary for the position of this job. Use the provided job description as input to extract all relevant information. This will involve conducting a thorough analysis of the job's responsibilities and the industry standards. You should consider both the technical and soft skills needed to excel in this role. Additionally, specify any educational qualifications, certifications, or experiences that are essential. Your analysis should also reflect on the evolving nature of this role, considering future trends and how they might affect the required competencies.

Rules:
Remove boilerplate text
Include only relevant information to match the job description against the resume

# Analysis Requirements
Your analysis should include the following sections:
Technical Skills: List all the specific technical skills required for the role based on the responsibilities described in the job description.
Soft Skills: Identify the necessary soft skills, such as communication abilities, problem-solving, time management, etc.
Educational Qualifications and Certifications: Specify the essential educational qualifications and certifications for the role.
Professional Experience: Describe the relevant work experiences that are required or preferred.
Role Evolution: Analyze how the role might evolve in the future, considering industry trends and how these might influence the required skills.

# Final Result:
Your analysis should be structured in a clear and organized document with distinct sections for each of the points listed above. Each section should contain:
This comprehensive overview will serve as a guideline for the recruitment process, ensuring the identification of the most qualified candidates.

# Job Description:
```
About the job

Vue.js Developer - Remote, USA

About Kaynes:
Kaynes is an innovative technology company passionate about developing software solutions that make a difference. We specialize in creating custom applications that meet our clients' unique needs across various industries. As we continue to grow, we're looking for a dedicated Vue.js Developer to join our dynamic team. This is a full-time, remote position available to candidates across the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. Whether you're interested in contract work or seeking a permanent role, Kaynes offers a supportive environment where you can grow your career.

Your Role:
As a Vue.js Developer at Kaynes, you will be at the heart of our front-end development team, responsible for building and maintaining web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. You'll leverage your expertise in Vue.js to develop dynamic, responsive, and interactive web applications. Collaborating closely with our back-end developers and UI/UX designers, you will ensure seamless integration and contribute to the overall design and functionality of our projects.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain high-quality, reusable, and scalable Vue.js applications.
Work with the back-end team to integrate APIs and ensure a seamless data flow.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate visual concepts into functional online experiences.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Implement modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks to enhance application capabilities.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Participate in code reviews, adhere to best practices, and contribute to the continuous improvement of our development processes.

Technical Requirements:
Proficient understanding of Vue.js and its core principles, including Vue CLI, Vuex, Vue Router, and Nuxt.js.
Strong expertise in JavaScript, ES6+, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and pre-processing platforms, such as SASS or LESS.
Familiarity with RESTful API integration.
Knowledge of front-end build tools, such as Webpack, NPM, or Yarn.
Understanding of version control tools, particularly Git.
Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha) is a plus.
Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Experience with responsive and adaptive design is crucial.

Experience:
2+ years of professional experience in Vue.js development or a similar role.
A portfolio showcasing your work on Vue.js projects, highlighting your contributions and the impact of your work.
Experience working in a remote environment and collaborating with distributed teams is preferred.

Who You Are:
A self-motivated and proactive problem solver, comfortable with remote work.
Passionate about creating user-friendly, efficient, and impactful web applications.
Keen to stay ahead of the curve, continuously learning about new technologies and frameworks.
Excellent communicator, able to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Detail-oriented, with a strong focus on delivering quality code and user experiences.

Join Us:
Join Kaynes and be part of a team that values innovation, creativity, and the impact of technology. Work remotely from anywhere in the US, enjoy flexible working hours, and contribute to projects that make a difference. At Kaynes, we believe in empowering our employees to grow and excel in their careers, without the constraints of formal education requirements.

Please note: This position does not require a university degree. We prioritize practical skills, experience, and a portfolio that demonstrates your abilities and passion for Vue.js development.
```

---

# Job Description Summary

replies:
# Job Description Summary

## Technical Skills:
- Proficient in Vue.js and its core principles (Vue CLI, Vuex, Vue Router, Nuxt.js).
- Strong expertise in JavaScript (ES6+ and modern frameworks).
- Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and pre-processing platforms (SASS, LESS).
- Familiarity with RESTful API integration.
- Knowledge of front-end build tools (Webpack, NPM, Yarn).
- Understanding of version control tools (Git).
- Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha) is a plus.
- Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues.
- Experience with responsive and adaptive design.

## Soft Skills:
- Self-motivated and proactive problem solver.
- Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.
- Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering quality code and user experiences.
- Passionate about creating user-friendly and impactful web applications.
- Eagerness to continuously learn about new technologies and frameworks.

## Educational Qualifications and Certifications:
- No formal university degree required; practical skills and experience are prioritized.
- A portfolio showcasing work on Vue.js projects is essential.

## Professional Experience:
- Minimum of 2+ years of professional experience in Vue.js development or a similar role.
- Experience working in a remote environment and collaborating with distributed teams is preferred.

## Role Evolution:
- The role of a Vue.js Developer is expected to evolve with advancements in web technologies and user expectations. Future trends may include:
  - Increased emphasis on performance optimization and scalability as web applications become more complex.
  - Greater integration of AI and machine learning in web applications, requiring developers to adapt and learn new frameworks.
  - A shift towards more collaborative tools and practices in remote work environments, necessitating strong communication and teamwork skills.
  - Continued focus on responsive design and accessibility, making it essential for developers to stay updated on best practices and standards.
  
This analysis serves as a guideline for identifying qualified candidates who possess the necessary skills and experiences for the Vue.js Developer position at Kaynes.
